A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.description:
The OpenAI Python library provides convenient access to the OpenAI API
from applications written in the Python language. It includes a pre-
defined set of classes for API resources that initialize themselves
dynamically from API responses which makes it compatible with a wide
range of versions of the OpenAI API.
dependent_to.name: py-openai

dependent_to.description: Parametrize and run Jupyter and nteract Notebooks.
dependent_to.name: py-papermill

dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
dependent_to.name: py-plotly
